item.title: 7 Steps To Buying a Home
item.description: It’s important to understand the home buying process so I’ve created a 7-step checklist. Step 1: Down Payment The hardest part to buying a home is saving the down payment (a gift from the Bank of Mom & Dad also works).

item.title: 20 Terms that Home Buyers Need to Know
item.description: Buying a home is one of the most important financial decisions you will make. It’s common for a first-time home buyer to be overwhelmed when it comes to real estate industry jargon, so this BLOG is to help make some of the jargon understandable.
